name: F.R.A.U.D. (Deceit of the Bullets)
description:
For 2 weeks after publication, 50% of ALL donations go towards Hurricane Laura victims!!!!

70% of pledges from incoming patrons also go to Hurricane Laura victims! 

--

F.R.A.U.D. is a Touhou-inspired game with some nasty twists. Can you figure out what the tricks are?

--

A game made in 7 days, inspired by the word 'fraud.'
